## DateApi.getValue() method

Gets wrapping object used for manipulation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getValue(value: DateValue | TDate, format?: string): DateApiObject<TDate>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | [DateValue](./datetime.datevalue.md) \| TDate | Value to be converted (parsed) and used for manipulation |
|  format | string | Format string used for parsing string value |

<b>Returns:</b>

[DateApiObject](./datetime.dateapiobject.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt;
